data_table.description: Family History Form, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: FHXAFLAG
variable.description: 1 =If form is present [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXACY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA01
variable.description: Please tell me which of the following best describes your current marital status. Q1 [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA02
variable.description: Was this participant's natural mother living at visit 1? Q2 [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA03A
variable.description: Is your natural mother living? Q3A [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA03B
variable.description: Approximately how old was she when she died? Enter 99 for ages 99 or older. Q3B [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA03C
variable.description: What was the cause of your natural mother's death? Q3C [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA04
variable.description: Was this participant's natural father living at visit 1? Q4 [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA05A
variable.description: Is your natural father living? Q5A [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA05B
variable.description: Approximately how old was he when she died? Enter 99 for ages 99 or older. Q5B [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA05C
variable.description: What was the cause of your natural father's death? Q5C [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA06A
variable.description: How many full brothers and sisters do you have? Q6A [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA06B
variable.description: How many brothers? Q6B [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FHXA06C
variable.description: How many sisters? Q6C [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.description: Is (name) a brother or A sister? Q8 [Family History Form, exam 2]

variable.description: Did (name) ever have a heart attack? Q12 [Family History Form, exam 2]
